name: Impossible Bike Crazy Stunts
description:
The extreme bike racing challenge on impossible bike tracks for real stunts rider is just going to happen where incredible stunts, fast bike racing, deadly obstacles, mid air jumps on broken impossible tracks will make your adrenaline rush fast. The thrilling bike racing adventure for deadly bike rider is a scary challenge for your racing career. Gather your courage for an extreme bike driving challenge where you need to dodge the obstacles on impossible bike tracks. Impossible Bike Tracks Stunts Rider is a thrilling racing sensation with freestyle driving and insane stunts on crazy impossible heights.

Impossible Bike Tracks Stunts Rider game of 2017 is a real driving test for extreme bike riders who love riding on jaw dropping heights. As an impossible death stunt racer speed up on impossible tracks in extreme driving simulator game of 2017. In moto riding adventure while showing death stunts you need to avoid impossible fall to become the legend of bike racing. Complete all challenging and thrilling missions on impossible tracks and overcome every hurdle without crashing. Be the incredible bike rider of impossible heights while drifting furiously on sky roads.

The super jumps on motorbike ramps will help you get though the broken impossible bike tracks. Be the real bike hero in this extreme simulation of motorbike racing adventure. Drive your bike at crazy impossible heights and complete the real scary impossible moto racing missions. Will you be able to collect all checkpoints and make it to the finish line in time? Let’s ride your motorbike on the extreme heights of impossible paths and mark your name in the death stunts hero of bike riding adventure!

Features:

+ Bike racing challenge on impossible heights!
+ Realistic physics for real moto racing experience!
+ Mid air jumps, extreme obstacles, fast driving & much more!
+ Collect all checkpoints and make it to the finish line in time!
+ The best bike racing adventure of 2017!
+ Superb graphics, cool animations and best sound effects!
